title: Bug 14197: Changes immediately made upon removing a working set
description: When a working set is removed, the changes are immediately made.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. The package view is filtered.
EB: The changes should not be made immediately upon removing the working set.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Remove the working set and observe that the changes are immediately made.
